name: ROLLTON FACTORY THE TRILOGY
description:
ever wondered why theyre arent any rollton instant noodles pack on store shelves? well "bomzpakiu fabrikas"(rollton instant noodels factory) is a paced epic music playing lore fulled first person shooter with a unique feature(there is no max health). deep into the factory to kill the owner of rollton (ivan ivanov) and later to kill the new owner (elvinas g.) and find out the deepest secret of instant noodles and its super dangerous oil.

PACK CONTAINS: bomzpakiu fabrikas 1,2 and the other(3)

TUTORIAL: wsad to walk, space to jump,MOUSE1 to shoot gun, shift to run, kill enemies and collect medikits to gain more health, dont forget to collect ammunition unless you want to die. MOUSE2 to shoot other gun. ESC to quick quit

when your health goes to 0 and bellow the application will close INSTANTLY. therefore you must learn your lesson unless you arent a true gamer.
